document_name: Strengthening Institutional Capacity for Gender and Human Rights responsive policies for HIV/AIDS in Tanzania

donor_name:
UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC &
CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Strengthen the capacity of the of the national counterparts and civil society to effectively respond to the HIV/AIDS epidemic through interventions that promote human rights, gender equality and universal access for MARPs. Also to facilitate the revision of guidelines and policies thus creating an enabling environment for implementation of the multisectoral HIV/AIDS response.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Strengthen the capacity of the of the national counterparts and civil society to effectively respond to the HIV/AIDS epidemic through interventions that promote human rights, gender equality and universal access for MARPs. Also to facilitate the revision of guidelines and policies thus creating an enabling environment for implementation of the multisectoral HIV/AIDS response.

project_descr: The project aims to create an enabling environment, appropriate policies and strategies and institutional capacity strengthening for a gender responsive and rights-based national response to HIV and AIDS for both Tanzania Mainland and Zanzibar
project_title: Capacity Building for Natl HIV Response
